title: All the World
description: All the world is here.  It is there.  It is everywhere.  All the world is right where you are.  Now.  Following a circle of family and friends through the course of a day from morning till night, this book affirms the importance of all things great and small in our world, from the tiniest shell on the beach, to warm family connections, to the widest sunset sky
author: Liz Garton Scanlon
